website_summaries.verdict: A brilliantly designed and incredibly easy to learn self-balancing personal transporter, with a variety of comfort and safety features that makes the Segway miniLITE well-worth the price for long term use.
pros: Easily handles a variety of terrain types
cons: Lacks the anti-theft control, headlights, and unmanned control seen in other Segway models

customer_reviews.title: Spins uncontrollably
customer_reviews.text: I bought this.... I've had it for 24 hours and it's already spinning uncontrollably.... I only used it on my carpet basement..... and it's 100% unrideable. I want a refund. *UPDATE* I emailed segway last night and they sent me directions on how to recalibrate and it works perfect now.... Turn the unit upside down and hold the power button until the wheels spin one way and then change and spin the other direction .... Fixed.... very happy with their service. It's a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ashack123

customer_reviews.title: Brings out the kid in me!
customer_reviews.text: Order this as an impulse buy on a deal of the day and love it. Didn’t notice the weight limit (175 lb) till after I ordered it. I am well over that limit but it still take me where I want to go, it’s been a lot of fun here in the 55 plus RV Park watching those older ones stop in their tracks and conversations as I roll by they just laugh and smile. 20 years ago I married up so I could slide into these parks a few years early at 50. Been the kid for three years now. Still can’t afford the golf cart so this works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Hornaday

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I don't really care about all the app related stuff. This was bought for a child, and needing to monitor it with the app to unlock full power is the worst thing about it. The machine itself is great, well made, and my son loves it. Since it has larger air inflated wheels, it can tackle grass and driveway gravel with no issue. If I could I would give it a 4.5 due to a 8 year old needing a smart phone to activate it.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Segway went rogue.
customer_reviews.text: My 65 yr old husband got this and had a great time riding it around. It seemed pretty easy to operate and learn to ride. HOWEVER, the thing just went rogue and became uncontrollable after only a few weeks. We disarmed it and have not been able to get it to work since. We did register it, but cannot connect using the app that must be downloaded to our phone (in order to operate the Segway). It keeps timing out before connecting. We have finally tracked down a customer service/tech support number thru Amazon and will try that tomorrow. A pretty expensive toy that lasted only a few weeks🙁.
customer_reviews.author: True

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a nice hoverboard and was unable to find one that would handle sidewalk bumps well. Look no further. This unit is terrific, you can tell it has more experienced software as it is very stable. The pneumatic tires are great for bumps and stones without causing you to lose your balance. The app software needs some work, though because neither my cell phone nor my iPad Pro could connect with Bluetooth but my iPhone was okay. HIGHLY RECOMMEND, especially when on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Ramone

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS THING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. The only odd time I had was the very first time I got on it. After that, it just seems natural to get on and ride. Very very simple to use. I wish I had got one of these a long time ago. I have gout in my knees, and this thing is a life saver when I have a flare up. All I have to do is stand on it and it does the walking for me. It's even easy to carry something while riding this. Really no different than when you are walking and carrying something.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gass

customer_reviews.title: Overheats
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my son not only was it late when it was supposed to be guaranteed delivered August 6, not even a month of having at the switch is stuck cannot Turn it on and off the machine had gotten so hot it burned my son’s leg... Waste of money do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sue Zia

customer_reviews.title: Extremely dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I have pictures but I cannot post. This thing's sensor can freak out and it is extremely dangerous to ride. I had all four limbs hurt when it freaked out and I fell on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: One works the other does not
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these for our children's birthdays. We all loved them. The kids are always outside playing all over the property. Last week one of the Segways would not turn off. The power button was unresponsive. At one point it would not stop beeping. I went online and read about other people having the same issue. I tried to contact customer support they are only available that I'm at work. However, I sent them an email but have yet to hear a response. I hope they will help as people who have fixed theirs have been more tech-savvy than I.
customer_reviews.author: AliMac

customer_reviews.title: I'm keeping both reason I received the second order the next day plus minor defect to replace
customer_reviews.text: I asked to replace this one and received the new one next day. I assumed it was to beep and defective. Maybe? I was riding it that night and why return it. Lol so I'm keeping this one as well as the new one I received. Main reasons really is such quick response and didnt need to return it first and wait for the new one. Trust. I liked that. Plus 250 for such a great product. Handlebars a must. So much safee
customer_reviews.author: murat ozmen

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! Bought it on a whim when it was on sale cyber Monday for my sons, ages 10 and 17. They both love riding it, especially the 10 year old. He rarely walks anymore. I thought it might become mine once they got bored with it, but no such luck. It is ridden daily by them inside the house and outside. An absolute steal at $250.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Wyse

customer_reviews.title: My kids freakin love these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 9 and 10 year old girls for Xmas and they love them!! Super easy to learn and ride around on. They go pretty fast and i love the app where I can control the speed and settings for each one. They are tons of fun for everyone that comes over to our house. I love zooming around the house on them too, my husband not so much!! We have a big house so when I’m cleaning or doing other jobs where I keep running back and forth a lot, I just hop on one of these and makes things easier plus its fun too!! Purchase these you wont regret it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gawd, finally a mature hover board product ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gawd, finally a mature hover board product! We have not purchased any of the previous hoverboard products because of how dangerous they are, both in terms of falling and because of questionable battery quality. The Segway miniLITE was much easier to start using, and very stable. The steering-by-knee design is a double edge sword - it improves stability, but it also means that it takes slightly longer to input commands and react. I'm not complaining - it reacts fast enough, and I'll take improved safety any day. Can't wait for the weather to get warmer so that we can ride this thing outside again.
customer_reviews.author: GreenBanana

customer_reviews.title: It fell in a river and survived with no issues
customer_reviews.text: This is significantly better than any hover board. This is much smarter and safer. The quality at this price is impressive. I will complain and complement at the same time by saying I fell off of it because of a patch of mud... it kept going even though I was not on it (it should have a kill switch) and it rolled into a river. It survived being completely submerged! Two months later no issues. That is amazing quality. I am a 145lb, 65kg rider and I have no issues with the device. There is nothing about this device that feels low quality. I am extremely impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lett

customer_reviews.title: Great motorized slider for video
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was cheaper than a motorized slider for shooting video. I have a Moza Air 2 which works great but if you have a lot of ground to cover and are not great at the ninja walk this works great. I can turn in place and go backward and shoot from either side, unlike my OneWheel. The OneWheel is WAY more fun and better for commuting but for slow speed endless dolly this version of the Segway is perfect for my needs. All factory sealed packaging with tamper proof seals. I have no idea on battery life yet.
customer_reviews.author: David Ditzler

customer_reviews.title: "Oh What Fun It Is To Ride A Mini Lite"
customer_reviews.text: Our 9 year granddaughter simply loves her new Segway!! She had never seen one before so she calls it her electric skateboard!! She had no problem taking right off on it. It manuvers around our very small house with no problem just wish there wasn't snow on the ground so she could ride outside ❄️☃️ UPDATED 05/20/2018 Although we still love the mini lite we also had the issue with it coming to an abrupt stop!!
customer_reviews.author: CJ718

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for a typical adult.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 mini-pros and we love them. But the steering bar on the mini-LITE is too short for a typical adult (I'm 5'10") and you can't raise it. You have to squat and hold your knees together to steer, very uncomfortable and way less intuitive. It makes the balance side-to-side harder on turns. These are fine for short persons or children. We returned them.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Peters

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not very good
customer_reviews.text: I bought one last month. The recharge plug is too loose to connect, so it didn't recharge. I then called the customer service for a whole day from 8 am in the morning. No one picked up the phone. I left message, received a reply call 2 weeks later but I missed it. I then chatted with Amazon, to be told that I was calling the wrong number. I then called the "correct number" and again, same result. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Yu

customer_reviews.title: This is a great item. We bought it for our kids for ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. We bought it for our kids for Christmas and they won't stop riding it around the house and outside. Pretty sturdy and hold charge really well. Easy for kids to get used to riding.
customer_reviews.author: MPH

customer_reviews.title: It's way to confusing. Didn't understand that I needed ...
customer_reviews.text: It's way to confusing. Didn't understand that I needed to "program" that thing. It did work without programing so I didn't know why I could never control it as I have with the standard larger model I have tried before. I finally gave I to my son who has programed it. The reason I gave it to him is that I fell 3 times on paved areas and really damage my left leg.
customer_reviews.author: Tomtrans

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome awesome  except....
customer_reviews.text: The Segway is very well built, the big inflated tires let you easily conquer small obstacles (potholes, uneven terrain) and it runs really smooth. The only thing that keeps it from five stars is the safety feature to slow the board down when you go at max speed. I even would say it’s dangerous, because you easily lose your balance. It would have been better to just cut the device off at a speed that is safe than having the board tilt back on its own. Please, Developer, if you read this, fix it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: It only took about 15 minutes for my 9 year old to master it. The only issue is that the app is confusing. When you first turn it on it makes you watch a tutorial but that wouldn’t play. Once that was figured out it had been great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicksname

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing! Really practical and economical
customer_reviews.text: Even after two months I still absolutely love this thing! Living downtown I use it almost every day when I'm home--at least ~5 times a week. It's actually a really practical and economical mode of transportation: 10-11 mile range, quite a bit faster than walking or jogging but without breaking a sweat (so you could use it to go to work or 'go out'), all electric and plugs into the wall to charge (charges super quick, too), small/light enough to carry up stairs if necessary (or to stash in a corner at a restaurant/office/etc), and downright fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: DavidR

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Will buy more for family members
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my kids. Everyone that sees this loves it. Easy to get used to. Love the value. Plan on buying more. I bought this on a whim as a last minute gift for a picky teen that wanted almost nothing....and he loved it and so did his siblings, friends, family, and strangers! I had bought a pretty nice hoverboard on the other kids Christmas lists and this is so much better in comparison...hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Veca M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Our family of 7's favorite Christmas present this year by far.  Incredible technology/ fun for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We have 5 kids (ages 4-17) and this was probably the favorite Christmas present of all of them (including my wife who also rides this regularly). There isn't a moment in our house where someone isn't whizzing by on this thing as they drive around our house. I honestly wish we bought two of these. The technology and quality is top notch. I can't say enough good things about this product. Very good product for the price. Very easy to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny N

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun...for an Adult! Careful going down hills
customer_reviews.text: I am significantly over the weight limit and I still ride this at full speed and never have any issues. Just beware going down slopes and reaching max speed, when it wants you to slow down it basically stalls and risks throwing you forward to your death. Going up hills, if the grade is too high, it stalls and risks throwing you backward - again, to your death.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mantis Toboggan

customer_reviews.title: We love riding this in the parks
customer_reviews.text: We love riding this in the parks. We use this more often than we were expecting and people love to ask about what this is. It is very easy to figure out how to ride. Only thing is when its training mode, it tries to compensate the tilting but it doesn't do it well. Once it becomes non training mode, much easier to ride
customer_reviews.author: Kin K Ly

customer_reviews.title: Older Lady got groove
customer_reviews.text: I rock and roll like a pro. Kids actually go...'Wow'' I spin this like a confident user of skateboards, x-dancer and gymnast. I used that knowledge to conquer this little beauty. Such amazing independence for limited income people. I hope to inspire others with limited options to use this lovely beast for store runs, Dr. Appt, checking out the main street..... 55+ and makes the kids jelly
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer support
customer_reviews.text: Segway stopped working after just a few months!! have tried calling and emailing customer support because the Segway is still under warranty, but cannot get in touch with anyone and I have left multiple emails and messages.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Way better than a hover board
customer_reviews.text: So worth it. This thing is awesome. Don’t waste your money on a hover board. While all the neighbors kids are stuck on the side walks or inside my son can ride just about anywhere with the Segway.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: They love these and ride them daily
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of them for my spoiled children. They love these and ride them daily. Not much wear and tear even though its been 3 months! Wish I would have bought a bigger one for myslef
customer_reviews.author: Cptcouch

customer_reviews.title: They love it
customer_reviews.text: Followed the directions (Segway app etc) . Charged it up. I now have a Segway course running through my kitchen/living room/front hallway. My GF and kids are competing for the best lap times. They love it. Easy setup, no issues at all. Almost out of "training mode". If things change I'll update my review, but for now it's great.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dioguardi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Owners manual was in another language. Also an international charger was sent. Unresponsive seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little getting used to but loads of fun once you do. I wasn't sure about the steering knee bar compared to the steering of hoverboards but wanted a genuine segway brand because I knew it would be good quality. But the steering bar seemed pretty natural. I bought this for the grandkids but now I wan one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Segway but only goes 10 miles an hour
customer_reviews.text: This Segway is a great Segway rides really smooth great safety features can hold up to 180 pounds I’m only 11 this is great but if you want to go fast then it’s not the Right one for you I love this thing but the only problem is it only goes 10 miles an hour so therefore I sold it and bought a Segway scooter which goes 15 miles an hour which you prefer if you want to go fast But overall The Segway is amazing best quality Segway you could get
customer_reviews.author: stephen kalos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for teenagers
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a friend's son and he loved it! I tried it myself and I wanted to get one for myself too. Easy to control and learn how to operate. Thinking about getting one for my kids too!
customer_reviews.author: Edison Jiang

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the "hover board" she thought she wanted
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a 10 year old who'd been asking for a hover board. This is leagues better, incredibly well-built, strong motor and nearly silent. Bright light patterns for night time fun, save up a little more and get this instead, the kiddo adores it.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppin' Dad

customer_reviews.title: Fun to ride, easy to learn.
customer_reviews.text: On Amazon listing and the manufacturers website says the app lets you control this model Segway. I cannot find a way to do this, sent an email to Segway about this and they replied that they got the email but never responded to the issue. Its been over 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Adams

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing. It’s very well made. It was easy to setup. It has an easy training walkthrough on the app. It was very easy to adapt to. The whole family was riding in no time. The charge lasts a long time as well. Much better choice than all the cheap and questionable “hover boards” out there.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Rolfs

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY AND TIME
customer_reviews.text: plesse save your money don’t buy. The warranty is only for 180 days which I think it’s because Segway knows that these products will die out. This is my second Segway and it’s really annoying how the same problems I had with the initial Segway is occurring with the supposedly new one. Smh Update I had this segway for close to a month now and I just say I’m sending it back because I’m not going to risk another injury.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so smooth
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! The larger rubber tires make it ride so smooth. I see others don't like the speed safety control but I like it. It's a Segway so it has a self balancing feature. So it's not going to throw you off. I feel a whole lot better about the kids being on the Minilite than I do when they are on a hoverboard. The LED lights are very cool at night and I like the app that is available to track speed, mileage, battery life, etc. All in all I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MZC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8yr old daughter for Christmas! She is in love with it and hasn’t wanted to get off of it. My son also loves it, I’m sure we will be purchasing another soon for him. Best purchase we have bought in a long time. Haven’t had any problems what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hover board
customer_reviews.text: The best hover board out there we got our son a off brand one that was complete crap so this year we decided to get a seagway and what a great choice high quality and there so many upgrades out there . Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Segway miniLITE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. I have a Segway S1 and she uses this. The miniLITE is incredibly stable and predictable while driving. Even for my 9 year old daughter, it is easy for her to ride. 5 stars all day!
customer_reviews.author: Tygerwoody

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My son had been begging for a hover board, but I decided to get him a Segway instead. I'm glad I did. He loved it! Smooth ride, sturdy, and good mileage on the battery. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: Fun,fun,fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife but the kids love it as well. You must remember this is for 165 and under. My oldest daughter was riding it through the house (not recommend) with a mop to mop the floors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Freaking amazing. The kids zoom through the house like the ...
customer_reviews.text: For $250 you would be a fool not to buy this. Freaking amazing. The kids zoom through the house like the jetsons.
customer_reviews.author: JONAH

customer_reviews.title: Where I can get a new handler
customer_reviews.text: I just bought it2months ago n the as it shows on the pics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... 5 minutes to find my balance but then I loved this thing
customer_reviews.text: Took 5 minutes to find my balance but then I loved this thing. After riding around for an hour or so my first words when getting off of it were "Walking sucks". Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy & good for getting to the store and back also!!! I've gone about 500miles and have only had to fill up the tires once! Very durable only thing is the beebing and the 10 miles per hr. Limit. Make it 15MPH please!
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.88

customer_reviews.title: bad experience with segway customer service
customer_reviews.text: The power button stopped working after about 7 months. I sent the segway the request for repairment or replacement, but no response from the manufacturer so far after over two weeks. That's not good.
customer_reviews.author: hamazon

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The battery went bad a few months after purchase and they no longer sell the batteries required. The response I got back after emailing was some of the segways we're left stagnant in the warehouse to long therefore killing off the battery but yet you can't replace! Please please save your money!
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 12 year old granddaughter for Christmas. Outstanding machine, not like those mall hover boards. This runs like a high end Segway. Very impressed with this and my granddaughter likes it 10 times more then I am.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B. Hermann

customer_reviews.title: Strangely fun
customer_reviews.text: More fun than it looks, works great for kids as young and 6 and lightweight adults. As long as you don't mind looking like GOB Bluth, it's a surprisingly effective and fun way to travel short distances.
customer_reviews.author: Erin MV

customer_reviews.title: Entry level Segway
customer_reviews.text: I can’t adjust the height of this entry level Segway handle, so it’s harder for an adult to control this wheel. After one hour training, my 5 year-old son can do this without help. Hopefully they can provide adjustable handle in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Has a learning curve,a few day but love it!!! N once you learn easy n awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ,minus for one star because it does for sure have a few day learning curve ,but people buy it! It's awesome n super fast shipping I'm 55 n was uncomfortable at first ,now still cautious! But I'm getting better! Lol buy it it's super cool!!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Mears

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! Bought for my daughter but I use it too. Only takes a few minutes to figure out so really easy to learn. Only complaint is that I now want it to go even faster now that we've mastered it, but it really is plenty fast. Just get a magic eraser for the times you leave a tire mark on a door or wall inside.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Very fun, fast, great battery life
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very fun. Fairly easy to use, very easy to crash also! Clip a wall or chair or...whatever, and the rider goes down! I should have bought 2!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this.
customer_reviews.text: Kids received this for Christmas 2017. They LOVE this. Living in central PA, they were out riding this in the freezing cold. Very stable to ride and easy to setup with the App. This is not your cheap Walmart hover board. You are getting Segway quality without the higher end Segway price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Does not function
customer_reviews.text: We tried two different Segway minilite’s and neither functioned! Come to find out this item has been sitting in storage for 4 years and it is common that they don’t work. This was very disappointing for our Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great hoverboard!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10-year-old daughter for Christmas and she absolutely loves it! It is very high quality and easy to learn. Much more stable than the generic hoverboards from China.
customer_reviews.author: KAVE

customer_reviews.title: awesome technologuy
customer_reviews.text: my son loves this and has become very adept at using it! excellent product, safe and well made- ordering another for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: E. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has been so much fun!! Our kids are having a blast...Mom & Dad are too 🤩
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this Product.  Amazon doesn't even have a return Tab for the item A Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my Godson and It worked for 1 hour in the driveway. It will not stop Beeping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, relaxing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one and the minipro. We use them on park trails and walking our dog. Perfect for spending some quality time without pressure on your legs / knees. Fun and super ez to learn to ride. Its NOT a hot-rod or speed demon
customer_reviews.author: Ty S.

customer_reviews.title: 11 year old grandson was thrilled!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very active and agile 11 year old grandson who was overjoyed! Couldn't have chosen a better gift. Very well made and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: J Shackelford

customer_reviews.title: Get handle bars and remove the knee bars! Safer!
customer_reviews.text: My kid only really lived this only after she bought the handle bars for them and removed the knee bars! It's much safer with handle bars also.
customer_reviews.author: Wenseslado D. Cano

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ride
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing and easy to ride. I bought this as a gift for my 14 year old son but we all ride it. My 8 year daughter was able to ride this after 5 minutes. This is very easy to ride and has a long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Beloved Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for four grandsons they love it and only their dad has fallen so far. (Not hurt just a little embarrassed )
customer_reviews.author: WJ Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing way to get around
customer_reviews.text: We bought three of these for the holidays and also bought hoverboard's and let my kids decide. No comparison between these. They handle hills, rougher terrain and are just constructed way better. So glad we bought these.
customer_reviews.author: cachais

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband and he’s had it out twice - with lots of improvement between the 2 times. We got him a helmet and I think he needs more protective pads, but he really enjoys being on it.
customer_reviews.author: MargaReader

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machines
customer_reviews.text: My three son's have each one (8,10 and 13 years old). They all love it. Together they have put 1000 miles on them. They are pretty rough with it but no issues yet. One had problems out of the box and had to be shipped back twice. Decent customer support. Works fine now. It's better than a hoverboard. You can go over grass, up curbs (if you're brave enough) and we have a segway dirt racetrack in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I ever imagined it would for a super ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a blast. Works better than I ever imagined it would for a super fair price. Delivery and product was just as posted. I would trust in these guys for future orders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money..... ten steps ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money..... ten steps up from Hooverboards. My nine yr old granddaughter won’t get off of it and picked up its operation quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Paigeyryn

customer_reviews.title: No customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Be aware! if for any reason u have to repair this, there is no customer service or any place you can turn to! i own 2 of these that i purchased in 2018 and both need repair, i’m trying to reach someone for weeks! but i’m just goin around in circles! it’s a shame! this is expensive stuff! why don’t they have a repair service for this! ?
customer_reviews.author: gj

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ride and hours of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Every kid that has tried the Segway has mastered it in under 5 minutes. They are really well built, have long-lasting batteries and go pretty darn fast. We look forward to taking it on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Corneail

customer_reviews.title: Great gift! Make sure you have a smartphone for the app control-Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! My son wanted a hover board and stumbled upon this after reading mixed reviews on all the brands. Well work the risk, my 11-year old son loves it. Has been on it all night!!!
customer_reviews.author: Confidential

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! A gift for my 3 boys (ages 13-7). Works great. Easy to use and get the hang of. Speed is perfect - not too fast but with enough power.
customer_reviews.author: Tags3

customer_reviews.title: Great Invention!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son for his Birthday and he LOVED it!! We didn't want to do a traditional Hover Board as we have heard bad things about them. I love how easy it is for him to ride it, how it doesn't let him go too fast, and how it has an app to set it up and track stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: At first I didn't download nothing and we were using it like that and we noticed our feet were going back ...
customer_reviews.text: Well if you don't download the app ur segwey isnt working propperly... At first I didn't download nothing and we were using it like that and we noticed our feet were going back bending too much and it wasn't comfortable to ride. I downloaded the app it ballanced and I hvnt experience anything like that anymore. So. It's all good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper at target
customer_reviews.text: Apparently it works well kids love it. However just saw not even a week after Prichard it’s almost $100 cheaper at target
customer_reviews.author: George Karakats

customer_reviews.title: Xmas Home run!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Amazing how quickly they got the hang of it. They ride it constantly in the house and have also taken on local bike or walking paths.
customer_reviews.author: BEBS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 7 year old Granddaughter and it works great. Very durable and the large tires allows her to ride in the yard over different terrains. Took her about an hour to ride like a pro. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: La Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter
customer_reviews.text: SEGWAY IS EXCELLENT! ONLY GAVE 3 STARS DUE TO AMAZON DROPPED PRICE 100$ DAY BEFORE I RECEIVED. STOCK RAN OUT QUICKLY AT LOWER COST SO CLD NOT RETURN AND ORDER AT CHEAPER COST. BUMMER
customer_reviews.author: B.B. KING

customer_reviews.title: takes a little getting used to but once you get the hang of it - its very easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: this thing is a blast and is much more stable than hover-boards that are the same price. takes a little getting used to but once you get the hang of it - its very easy and fun.
customer_reviews.author: R. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Woohoo!
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate addition to steady cam photography. Using around house for trash takeout and mail retrieval. Quicker than going full armor and operates very similar to low level repulsar flight.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Man

customer_reviews.title: You parents will be wanting one for yourself. Lol
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Segway mini for our 8 year old daughter for Christmas and she loves it. We have not had no problems with it whatsoever so far. She had no problem learning to ride it either which she is a very fast learner.
customer_reviews.author: Tamrew9

customer_reviews.title: Built in over speed mechanics
customer_reviews.text: Built in over speed mechanism causes the board to tilt backwards which in most cases is unanticipated by the user. Otherwise it is an awesome piece of tech.
customer_reviews.author: Vönanthöny

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible product. It is rugged and smart. The kids have logged more than two dozen miles and it is easy to control and intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: RaH

customer_reviews.title: Unlock speed via app.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to download app, do the firmware upgrade and view videos to unlock full speed. Excellent quality and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: A. Panek

customer_reviews.title: Fun at a bargain.  Easy to learn for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality, from the packaging, to the easy set up, to the product itself. You can tell this is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great little toy, easy to use and setup. The knee steering takes some getting used to. Waiting to buy the handle bar to make it
customer_reviews.text: Great little toy, easy to use and setup. The knee steering takes some getting used to. Waiting to buy the handle bar to make it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Izak K.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: the car is cool and works well. But the app to register the car doesn’t work! If donot register the car, it will not work after the car runs for a few miles.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha moller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ride
customer_reviews.text: Easy start up. Very quiet. Seems more safe than the popular hover board. Drives easily on grass or indoors. The 10 and 12 year olds say it hurts their knees because the handle rides there and it’s heavy. Overall. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Mullins, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Fun and safe! Such a blast to ride
customer_reviews.text: Great electric board! Easy to learn and super safe. Battery last a long time and goes pretty far. So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: JBoi

customer_reviews.title: Poor speed Governor
customer_reviews.text: When you get to a certain speed it slows you down by tilting the body backwards with a falling sensation.
customer_reviews.author: Doctormichael

customer_reviews.title: Requires a helmet, knee and elbow pads
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids really enjoy their Christmas present. Easy for them to navigate. Parental note please control the speed for their safety 10 mph is to fast and they can quickly loose control also helmet and knee and elbow pads need to be a part of this .
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This Segway is way better than expected. The whole family got used to it in minutes and my sons are riding it all over the neighborhood. The battery lasts 4-5 hours of constant use which is amazing. We couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Philip B.

customer_reviews.title: Charging problem
customer_reviews.text: I used it totally less than one month, and the charger stoped working.
customer_reviews.author: zibin yang

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt be happier
customer_reviews.text: Cant say enough good things about this segway. My grandson is 10 and LOVES it. Durable , east to operate. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Juju

product_meta.title: Segway miniLITE Smart Self-Balancing Electric Transporter, White
product_meta.description: The Segway miniLITE is a truly "lite" incarnation of the Segway miniPRO. It's scaled down, but not watered down. As a hands-free, self-balancing scooter, the miniLITE continues Segway's tradition of innovating personal transportation. It sports the same large pneumatic tires and top speed capability of the miniPRO, and is fully compatible with the Ninebot-Segway mobile app. It's ready to take on the urban terrain, indoors and outdoors. Do not attempt your first ride in any area where you might encounter children, pedestrians, pets, vehicles, bicycles, or other obstacles and potential hazards.
feature_bullets: 700 watts of Engine power. Appropriate age: 6+
10.5 inch air filled pneumatic tires providing smoother rides; Maximum range: 11 miles (18km)
11 miles of range on a fully charged battery and top speed of 10 mph (depending on rider's weight and riding habits)
Max load of 175 pounds; UL 2272 certified to meet fire and electrical safety standards.
